result.arabic_text: خُذِ ٱلۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ
result.translation: 199. Nabiyow koo kee kummat sinaamak meqe cal kee meqe taamoomi oggola, keenik gibdim keenik magurrusinaay meqe maxcoo kee meqe abinah ken amris, kasmaleelat mangalinaay tuugima magiddiyinaay derre keenit cab.
